plot: An Eskimo struggles to understand why God keeps trying to reach into his igloo. When the Eskimo decides to stop thwarting God, his choice comes with some unexpected consequences.
title: The Eskimo
plot_es: An Eskimo struggles to understand why God keeps trying to reach into his igloo. When the Eskimo decides to stop thwarting God, his choice comes with some unexpected consequences.
plot_en: An Eskimo struggles to understand why God keeps trying to reach into his igloo. When the Eskimo decides to stop thwarting God, his choice comes with some unexpected consequences.
